alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Albany and west central Platte Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laramie Peak, or 21 miles northwest of Wheatland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Albany and west central Platte Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Laramie Range
